guide_intro: Here is a detailed step-by-step guide for each tool and tab in CTAI Studio.
guide_arch_viz_steps:
### Visualization Tab
1. Upload a sketch or rough 3D model image (optional) to guide the AI structure.
2. Enter a detailed description (e.g., 'Modern 3-story villa, large glass windows, pool').
3. Select additional settings: Context (Urban/Rural), Time (Day/Night), Weather.
4. Click 'Generate Image' and wait for AI processing.
### Creative Perspective Tab
1. Upload an input image (perspective or photo).
2. Select the desired output aspect ratio.
3. Click 'Generate Prompt Suggestions'. AI will analyze the image and generate 30-40 unique camera angle ideas.
4. Select a prompt and click 'Generate Image' to see the result.
### Improvement Tab
1. Select 'Exterior' or 'Interior' mode.
2. Upload an old render or low-quality image.
3. Click 'Start Improvement'. AI automatically performs: Enhance Background -> Create Sketch -> Re-render.
4. (Optional) In the final step, upload a reference image to transfer its style/lighting.
guide_360_steps:
### View & Navigate
1. Upload a 360 Panorama image (2:1 ratio, e.g., 4096x2048).
2. Use mouse (desktop) or touch (mobile) to drag and look around.
### Camera Control Panel
1. Use Pan buttons (Up/Down/Left/Right) to rotate the camera view in place.
2. Use Orbit buttons to move the camera around the focal point.
3. Use Zoom buttons to zoom in/out details.
4. Use Undo/Redo to navigate through your edit history.
guide_video_steps:
### Generate Video Tab
1. Enter a script idea or detailed video description in the text box.
2. Upload a reference image (optional) to define the character or style.
3. Select aspect ratio (16:9 Landscape or 9:16 Portrait).
4. Check 'Construction Timelapse' if you want to create a building process video.
5. Click 'Generate Video' and wait (takes about 2-3 minutes).
### DirectorAI Tab
1. Upload a subject image.
2. Enter a rough idea.
3. Click 'Analyze & Develop'. AI will act as a director and write 20 detailed scene scripts.
4. Select a script and click the 'Generate Video' button next to it.
guide_edit_steps:
### Edit Selection
1. Upload image.
2. Use Brush, Lasso, or Polygon tool to mask the object/area to edit.
3. Enter description of change (e.g., 'remove person', 'add tree', 'change to wood door').
4. Click 'Generate'.
### Paint House
1. Upload building image.
2. Select 'Paint' function. Mask the wall area.
3. Choose a paint brand (Jotun, Dulux...) and color from the palette.
4. AI repaints the wall while preserving shadows and texture.
### Merge & Material
1. Select 'Merge House' or 'Change Material'.
2. Upload original image and a reference image (sample house/material).
3. Mask the area on the original image to be replaced.
4. Click generate to blend the two images.
### Interior
1. Select 'Interior' tab. Upload empty room image.
2. Upload loose furniture images (chairs, tables...). AI auto-removes background.
3. Enter placement description (e.g., 'place sofa in center').
### Sync Character
1. Upload multiple background images.
2. Upload or generate a character.
3. Click 'Sync'. AI places the character into all backgrounds naturally.
guide_drawing_steps:
### Technical Drawing Tab
1. Upload a 3D perspective image of the building.
2. Select drawing type: Floor Plan, Elevation, or Section.
3. Select detail level and line style (CAD, Ink...).
4. Click 'Generate Drawing' to convert 3D to 2D technical drawing.
### Sketchup Tab
1. Upload a 2D floor plan image.
2. Select parameters: Architectural style, Main materials, Context.
3. Select desired view (Aerial, Eye-level, Elevation).
4. Click 'Generate Image' to simulate a 3D Sketchup view.
guide_luban_steps:
### Lu Ban Ruler Tab
1. Enter dimension (mm) into Width or Height box.
2. View results instantly on the ruler: Red is good, Black is bad. Read meaning below.
### Stairs Tab
1. Enter floor height (mm).
2. Click 'Calculate'. System suggests step counts falling in 'Sinh' (4n+1) category.
3. Click 'Draw' to see a detailed cross-section.
### Gate Tab
1. Enter planned gate width.
2. Compare with suggested auspicious dimensions (Lu Ban 52.2cm).
### Ramp & Roof Tab
1. Enter ramp height/length to check slope % and safety.
2. Enter roof width to calculate peak height and optimal drainage slope.
guide_fengshui_steps:
### Bat Trach Tab
1. Enter homeowner info: Name, Birth year, Gender.
2. Upload floor plan. Click on image to set house center.
3. Nhấn 'Phân tích'. AI sẽ vẽ đồ hình Bát quái lên mặt bằng và đưa ra luận giải chi tiết.
### Trach Menh Tab
1. Enter info for all family members.
2. Upload land plot image, set center and direction.
3. AI advises if the house direction suits the family.
### Loan Đầu & Dương Trạch Tab
1. Enter address or upload satellite image.
2. AI analyzes terrain (Four Celestials) and internal layout (Door-Kitchen-Bed).
### Other Utilities
1. **Auspicious Date:** Find good days for construction.
2. **Prayers:** Generate traditional prayer texts.
3. **Colors:** See colors matching destiny.
4. **Am Trach:** Analyze grave direction and burial data.
guide_planning_steps:
### Layout Plan Tab
1. Upload satellite image or land map.
2. Use drawing tool to mask/color functional zones (Red: Commercial, Yellow: Residential...).
3. Select planning type (Urban, Resort, Industrial...).
4. Click 'Generate Plan' for AI to propose subdivision and roads.
### 3D Perspective Tab
1. Upload 2D planning map (can use the one generated above).
2. Select architectural style and time (Day/Night).
3. Click 'Generate Perspective' to render a 3D overview.
guide_costing_steps:
### Cost Estimation Tab
1. Enter project parameters: Area, floors, rooms, style, location.
2. Upload design images (if any) for better analysis.
3. Click 'Estimate'. AI generates a detailed cost table (Raw, Finishing, Interior...).
### Material Advice Tab
1. Enter maximum budget (e.g., 3 billion).
2. Click 'Advise Materials'. AI suggests material types fitting the budget.
### Paint Area Tab
1. Enter dimensions of rooms, doors, windows.
2. AI calculates exact wall area to paint and converts to number of paint buckets needed.
guide_reference_steps:
### Construction Density Tab
1. Enter land area and province/city.
2. Click 'Lookup'. AI checks QCVN 01:2021 for max density and allowed floors.
### Planning Lookup Tab
1. Select province/city.
2. System links to the official local planning portal.
### Fire Safety Tab
1. Select building type (Residential, Karaoke, Factory...).
2. Ask specific question (e.g., 'How wide must exit stairs be?').
3. AI cites current Fire Safety regulations to answer.
guide_upscale_steps:
### Image Upscale
1. Upload a low-resolution, blurry, or grainy image.
2. Select mode:
   - **Fast:** Basic sharpening.
   - **Detailed (Ultra):** AI reimagines missing details, denoises, and upscales to 4K.
3. Click button and wait. Use slider to compare before/after.
guide_sun_wind_steps:
### Analysis
1. Upload 3D perspective image.
2. Enter location, orientation, season, and surroundings.
3. (New) Enter additional description for focused analysis.
4. Click 'Create Climate Analysis Moodboard'. AI generates visual analysis including sun path, wind flow, and thermal map.
### Solution & Style
1. After analysis, AI auto-generates a 'Style Reference' image suggesting climate-responsive design.
2. Enter solution description or let AI suggest.
3. Click 'Generate Solution Perspective' to see the building optimized with louvers, greenery...
